description: Conversion of Knotley Springfield into 5 one bedroom and 5 two bedroom flats demolition of other buildings on the site and Nos 18 and 20 Sherwood Way erection of 3 two storey and 2 three storey buildings comprising 4 one bedroom and 36 two bedroom flats and 4 two bedroom and 1 three bedroom houses with estate road access from Sherwood Way and 72 car parking spaces (23 of which covered by open fronted structures)
